name: Handwritten icon of the Lord Almighty

metadata.name: Handwritten icon of the Lord Almighty
metadata.description:
This is orthedexal handwritten creativity with the transfer of the original. That is, the buyer of the token is provided with the original, which he will receive by mail

The work was done on a lime board with oak dowels, linen pavolok, chalk levkas, natural mineral pigments, drying oil, varnish. 
The size of the presented icon: 20Ã—30 cm.
The significance of the icon "Savior" is very great for the entire Christian world. This is the standard image of the Savior, accepted throughout Christianity. the image is simpler and closer to the heart of the common man
, the original was written before 1917 according to all the canons of Andrei Rublev, this icon could only be painted by a monk-a specialist icon painter.
